issue.title: [C++][Packaging] No NVidia CUDA toolkit on AArch64C
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5520](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5520). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There is no NVidia CUDA toolkit packages for AArch64 so please disable it there.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5520?focusedCommentId=16857370) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Could you send a pull request on GitHub https://github.com/apache/arrow with "ARROW-5520: [Packaging] ${SUMMARY}" subject?
See also https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/contributing.html#how-to-contribute-patches

You don't need to change https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/changelog. It's updated automatically on release process.

I think that we need to update "Architecture: " for CUDA related packages such as https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/dev/tasks/linux-packages/debian/control#L69 .
See also for "Architecture": https://www.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/ch-controlfields.html#s-f-architecture
